FullInspector.IPropertyEditorEditAPI Interface Reference

This is the core editing API that property editors use. We split the editing API and the IPropertyEditor interfaces into two as we define extension methods on IPropertyEditor that allows FI to run arbitrary code before/after the actual edit method executes. More...

Detailed Description

This is the core editing API that property editors use. We split the editing API and the IPropertyEditor interfaces into two as we define extension methods on IPropertyEditor that allows FI to run arbitrary code before/after the actual edit method executes.

Member Function Documentation

object FullInspector.IPropertyEditorEditAPI.Edit ( Rect  region,
GUIContent  label,
object  element 
)

Display a Unity inspector GUI that provides an editing interface for the given object.

Parameters
regionThe rect on the screen to draw the GUI controls.
labelThe label to label the controls with.
elementThe element itself to edit. This can be mutated directly. For values which cannot be mutated, such as structs, the return value is used to update the stored value.
Returns
An updated instance of the element.

Implemented in FullInspector.Internal.AttributePropertyEditor, FullInspector.Internal.AbstractTypePropertyEditor, and FullInspector.Internal.NullablePropertyEditor.

float FullInspector.IPropertyEditorEditAPI.GetElementHeight ( GUIContent  label,
object  element 
)

Returns the height of the region that needs editing.

Parameters
labelThe label that will be used when editing.
elementThe element that will be edited.
Returns
The height of the region that needs editing.

Implemented in FullInspector.Internal.AttributePropertyEditor, FullInspector.Internal.AbstractTypePropertyEditor, and FullInspector.Internal.NullablePropertyEditor.

GUIContent FullInspector.IPropertyEditorEditAPI.GetFoldoutHeader ( GUIContent  label,
object  element 
)

Returns a header that should be used for the foldout. An item is displayed within a foldout when this property editor reaches a certain height.

Parameters
labelThe current foldout label.
elementThe current object element.
Returns
An updated label.

Implemented in FullInspector.Modules.Collections.IDictionaryPropertyEditor< TDictionary, TKey, TValue >, FullInspector.Modules.Collections.ICollectionPropertyEditor< TDerived, T >, FullInspector.Internal.AttributePropertyEditor, FullInspector.Internal.AbstractTypePropertyEditor, FullInspector.PropertyEditor< TElement >, FullInspector.AttributePropertyEditor< TElement, TAttribute >, FullInspector.Modules.Collections.IListPropertyEditor< TList, TData >, FullInspector.Internal.NullablePropertyEditor, and FullInspector.Internal.ArrayPropertyEditor< T >.

object FullInspector.IPropertyEditorEditAPI.OnSceneGUI ( object  element)

Draw an optional scene GUI.

Parameters
elementThe object instance to edit using the scene GUI.
Returns
An updated object instance.

Implemented in FullInspector.Internal.NullablePropertyEditor, FullInspector.Internal.AttributePropertyEditor, and FullInspector.Internal.AbstractTypePropertyEditor.
